value.stringValue: Hi, Please approve the changes. Thanks!
Hi, Please approve the changes. Thanks!

rules.name: myRule_5
rules.label: APS is triggered by staff members?

value.stringValue: IF(($Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' && $Profile.Name != 'Orde Customer Community Login User') && (ISNEW()==true && [loan__Automated_Payment_Setup__c].Created_after_conversion__c ==false) ,TRUE,FALSE)

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: IF(({!$Profile.Name} != 'System Administrator' && {!$Profile.Name} != 'Orde Customer Community Login User') && (ISNEW()==true && {!myVariable_current.Created_after_conversion__c} ==false) ,TRUE,FALSE)

value.stringValue: IF(($Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' && $Profile.Name != 'Orde Customer Community Login User') && [loan__Automated_Payment_Setup__c].Created_after_conversion__c == false && ((ISCHANGED([loan__Automated_Payment_Setup__c].Active_Change__c) == true || ISCHANGED([loan__Automated_Payment_Setup__c].Actual_Date_Change__c) == true || ISCHANGED([loan__Automated_Payment_Setup__c].Amount_Type_Change__c) == true || ISCHANGED([loan__Automated_Payment_Setup__c].Amount_Type_Split_Factor_Change__c) == true || ISCHANGED([loan__Automated_Payment_Setup__c].Debit_Date_Change__c) == true || ISCHANGED([loan__Automated_Payment_Setup__c].Debit_Day_Change__c) == true || ISCHANGED([loan__Automated_Payment_Setup__c].Frequency_Change__c) == true || ISCHANGED([loan__Automated_Payment_Setup__c].Transaction_Amount_Change__c) == true || ISCHANGED([loan__Automated_Payment_Setup__c].Type_Change__c) == true)), TRUE, FALSE)

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5
formulas.expression: IF(({!$Profile.Name} != 'System Administrator' && {!$Profile.Name} != 'Orde Customer Community Login User') && {!myVariable_current.Created_after_conversion__c} == false && ((ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Active_Change__c}) == true || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Actual_Date_Change__c}) == true || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Amount_Type_Change__c}) == true || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Amount_Type_Split_Factor_Change__c}) == true || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Debit_Date_Change__c}) == true || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Debit_Day_Change__c}) == true || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Frequency_Change__c}) == true || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Transaction_Amount_Change__c}) == true || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Type_Change__c}) == true)), TRUE, FALSE)

value.stringValue: The APS has been rejected due to incorrect information being entered. Please review, re-enter and submit again for approval as soon as possible
